item.title: OR-18 East at OR-22
item.description: OR-18 east approaching OR-22. OR-22 follows OR-18 east to Willamina.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 west at OR-22. Continue straight for OR-22 West to Detroit and Salem. Merge left for US-20/OR-126 West to Albany and Eugene.

item.title: Diagram of US-20/OR-126/OR-22 Junction - US-20/OR-126 West
item.description: Map diagram of junction at US-20/OR-126/OR-22 junction on US-20/OR-126 West. Continue straight for OR-22 west to Salem; merge left to continue west on US-20/OR-126 West to Eugene.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West Approaching OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 West approaching OR-22 on the west side of Santiam Pass. Continue on US-20/OR-126 West for Albany and Eugene.

item.title: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 West
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. Use OR-22 west for Detroit and Salem; use US-20/OR-126 east for Sisters and Bend.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at OR-22
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 East Approaching OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 East approaching OR-22 in Linn County. In background is a West Cascades Scenic Byway sign. Turn left on OR-22 to continue on West Cascades Scenic Byway.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 253
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 253 - OR-22/OR-99E Business/Detroit Lake/Bend.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 253
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 253 - OR-22/Bus. OR-99E/Detroit Lake/Bend.

item.title: US-101 North Approaching OR-22
item.description: US-101 north approaching OR-22. Turn right for OR-22 east to McMinnville and Valley Junction. Turn left for US-101 north to Tillamook and Astoria. Also use OR-22 for the Hebo Ranger District of the Siuslaw National Forest.

item.title: OR-18 West at OR-22
item.description: OR-18 west at OR-22 east to Willamina and Salem. OR-22 west joins OR-18 west to Valley Junction.

item.title: OR-18 West Approaching OR-22
item.description: OR-18 west approaching OR-22. Use OR-22 east for Willamina and Salem. OR-22 west joins OR-18 west to Valley Junction.

item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.description: OR-18 east at OR-22 west to Hebo and Tillamook. OR-18/OR-22 east continue on to Portland and Salem.

item.description: OR-18/OR-22 east split. OR-18 proceeds east to Portland; OR-22 east to Salem.

item.title: OR-22 East at OR-99W
item.description: OR-22 east at OR-99W. Use OR-99W south to Rickreall Fairgrounds, and Monmouth. Use OR-99W north to McMinnville. Continue east on OR-22 to Salem. This intersection has been replaced with a full interchange.
